title: Electronic Organizer Travel USB Cable Accessories Bag/Case,Waterproof for Power Bank,Charging Cords,Chargers,Mouse ,Earphones Flash Drive
descriptions:

With two compartments and ample storage capacity for items like power banks, cables, earphones, chargers, and more, this organizer keeps all your gadgets safe and secure. The well-padded semi-flexible interior ensures that your devices are protected at all times.

Perfect for travel or family use, this organizer comes with multiple carry options, including a portable belt for easy transportation. Not just for tech accessories, this organizer can also double as a cosmetic carrying bag.
